field.name: summary
field.value: FormHelper error on null properties when ControllerDetails.Stateless is true

field.name: description
field.value:
I create a controller with the Stateless attribute set to true. If I attempt to create a FormHelper element in my view with a target which does not exist in the property bag for the controller, I get the below error. This appears to be happening because, after looking in the PropertyBag and Flash memory, the helper attempts to find the target for the element in Session.
